title: Bwi Golgothayao mani hangkw
lyrics:
Bwi Golgothayao mani hangkw
Bwi Kalvaryao mani hangkw -2
Benwsw nama Krushni hangkw-a
Benwsw nama jiuni lamaya -2
(A)
Bifa, Bisa, Gwthar Jiu nwng
Gaswi subung swrjigiri nwng -2
Muluk subungni papni thakwi
Golgothani krushkhou somai hwbai -2
(B)
Jwngblow jwngni sibithili nwng
Krushni hangkw orai lananwi -2
Gwthar bijabni gwthar batra
Jwngblowbai thathwng Krushni sayao -2
